General.Name: Oceanteam ASA
General.Description: Oceanteam ASA operates as an offshore shipping company in the Gulf of Mexico, Latin America, West Africa, and the Asia-Pacific. It operates through Oceanteam Shipping and Oceanteam Solutions segments. The company owns, charters, and manages two deepwater offshore construction support vessels, four fast support vessels (FSVs), and pipe lay vessels on long term contracts with solid subsea construction companies. It also provides equipment for offshore cable laying, umbilical installations, on and offshore cable storage, and cable transportation; and designs and engineers platforms and infrastructures for the oil and gas and renewables industry. In addition, the company rents tensioners, turntables, and reels. It serves oil and gas, offshore renewables, and civil engineering sectors. The company was formerly known as Oceanteam Shipping ASA and changed its name to Oceanteam ASA in December 2015. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Bergen, Norway.
